summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Sixteenth Avenue Northeast and Seventeenth Avenue Northeast, each from East Sixty-fifth Street to East Seventy-fifth Street; East Sixty-fifth Street, East Sixty-eighth Street, East Seventieth Street East Seventy-third Street and East Seventy-fifth Street, each from Fifteenth Avenue Northeast to Seventeenth Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks and providing for the necessary surface and sub-drainage; all in accordance with Resolution No. 2705 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
